name: MicroorganismsDetectionBySputumCulture
title: Microorganisms Detection by Sputum Culture
description: This value set may undergo changes until the HL7 Multiple Chronic Care FHIR IG is formally published in 2024.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values contains codes for lab tests to identify microorganisms in sputum culture.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of sputum for microorganism detection.),(Inclusion Criteria: Microorganism detection in sputum culture, coded in LOINC, using source of sputum represented using LOINC codes.),(Exclusion Criteria: Does not include any codes or concepts which do not represent Sputum Culture tests as defined in the inclusion criteria.)
